text: Aubessagne is a commune in the Hautes-Alpes department. The municipality was created on 1 January 2018 and consists of the former communes of Chauffayer (the seat), Saint-Eusèbe-en-Champsaur and Les Costes.Arrêté préfectoral 23 November 2017 == References == Category:2018 establishments in France Category:Communes in Hautes-Alpes
title: Aubessagne
